text: Changlimithang Stadium is the multi-purpose stadium in Thimphu, Bhutan. It is predominantly a home for the Bhutanese national football team and also is used for other purposes. It was inaugurated in 1974 for the coronation of His Majesty the Fourth Druk Gyalpo Jigme Singye Wangchuck and further refurbished in 2007 for the coronation of the Druk Gyalpo Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck. == References == Category:Sport in Bhutan Category:Football stadiums in Asia Category:Thimphu Category:1974 establishments in Asia
title: Changlimithang Stadium
